mapper.select: SELECT A.DEAL_NO AS IB_DEAL_NO , A.JDGM_DCD AS RISK_INSPCT_CCD , A.MTR_DCD AS LST_C_CASE_CCD , A.SQ AS SQ , A.LGL_PRCR_CCD AS LGL_PRCR_CCD , B.CD_VL_NM AS LGL_PRCR_CCD_NM , A.LGL_PRCR_KND_CCD AS LGL_PRCR_KND_CCD , C.CD_VL_NM AS LGL_PRCR_KND_CCD_NM , A.LGL_PRCR_CNTNT AS LGL_PRCR_CNTNT , A.CRTRM_INFO AS CRTRM_INFO , A.ACDNT_NO AS ACDNT_NO , DATE_FORMAT(A.RGST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RGST_DT , A.FST_RGST_P_ENO AS FST_RGST_P_ENO , D.EMP_NM AS FST_RGST_P_ENO_NM FROM IBIMS608B A LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B B ON B.CMNS_CD_GRP ='P010' AND A.LGL_PRCR_CCD =B.CD_VL_ID LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B C ON C.CMNS_CD_GRP ='L002' AND A.LGL_PRCR_KND_CCD =C.CD_VL_ID LEFT JOIN IBIMS003B D ON A.FST_RGST_P_ENO =D.EMPNO WHERE A.DEAL_NO = #{dealNo} AND A.JDGM_DCD = #{jdgmDcd} AND A.MTR_DCD = #{mtrDcd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBIMS608B ( DEAL_NO , JDGM_DCD , MTR_DCD , SQ , LGL_PRCR_CCD , LGL_PRCR_KND_CCD , LGL_PRCR_CNTNT , CRTRM_INFO , ACDNT_NO , RGST_DT , RGST_TM , FST_RGST_P_ENO , HNDL_DY_TM , HNDL_DPRT_CD , HNDL_P_ENO ) VALUES ( #{dealNo} , #{jdgmDcd} , #{mtrDcd} , #{sq} , #{lglPrcrCcd} , #{lglPrcrKndCcd} , #{lglPrcrCntnt} , #{crtrmInfo} , #{acdntNo} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%H%i%s') , #{hndlPEno } , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() , #{hndlDprtCd } , #{hndlPEno } )
mapper.update: UPDATE IBIMS608B SET LGL_PRCR_CCD = #{lglPrcrCcd} , LGL_PRCR_KND_CCD = #{lglPrcrKndCcd} , LGL_PRCR_CNTNT = #{lglPrcrCntnt} , CRTRM_INFO = #{crtrmInfo} , ACDNT_NO = #{acdntNo} , HNDL_DY_TM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() , HNDL_DPRT_CD = #{hndlDprtCd} , HNDL_P_ENO = #{hndlPEno} WHERE DEAL_NO = #{dealNo} AND JDGM_DCD = #{jdgmDcd} AND MTR_DCD = #{mtrDcd} AND SQ = #{sq}
